queries.query: select a.element_type, a.attribute_id , a.attribute_code, a.attribute_type, a.content_txt_xml from vw_attributes a order by a.element_type, a.attribute_code

select h.parent_id, h.elements_contents_id, h.livello, h.element_id, h.element_type, h.element_title , (select top 1 1 from elements_contents where element_id = h.element_id) as has_childs , (select top 1 1 from elements_contents ec join elements e on e.element_id = ec.child_element_id and e.element_type = 'element' where ec.element_id = h.element_id) as has_child_elements , a.attribute_code, a.attribute_type, a.content_txt_xml, a.val_datetime, a.val_integer, a.val_link, a.val_real, a.val_text, a.val_varchar from vw_elements_h h left join vw_elements_attrs a on a.element_id = h.element_id where h.ref_element_id is null and {@field='filter_level'} order by h.element_id

select t.* from ( select null as parent_id, null as elements_contents_id, 0 as livello, h.element_id, h.element_type, h.element_title , null as has_childs, null as has_child_elements , a.attribute_code, a.attribute_type, a.content_txt_xml, a.val_datetime, a.val_integer, a.val_link, a.val_real, a.val_text, a.val_varchar from vw_elements h left join vw_elements_attrs a on a.element_id = h.element_id where h.element_id = {@field='id_element'} union select h.parent_id, h.elements_contents_id, h.livello + 1 as livello, h.element_id, h.element_type, h.element_title , (select top 1 1 from elements_contents where element_id = h.element_id) as has_childs , (select top 1 1 from elements_contents ec join elements e on e.element_id = ec.child_element_id and e.element_type = 'element' where ec.element_id = h.element_id) as has_child_elements , a.attribute_code, a.attribute_type, a.content_txt_xml, a.val_datetime, a.val_integer, a.val_link, a.val_real, a.val_text, a.val_varchar from vw_elements_h h left join vw_elements_attrs a on a.element_id = h.element_id where h.ref_element_id = {@field='id_element'} and {@field='filter_level'} ) t order by t.livello, t.element_id
